meanings.definition: To move text or images up or down on a screen.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy scrolling through social media to see what my friends are up to.
meanings.sent2: She was scrolling through the news feed on her phone.
meanings.sent3: While scrolling through the document, I accidentally deleted an important paragraph.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced on the touchpad, scrolling through the webpage effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed the students how to scroll down to read the rest of the article.

meanings.definition: A continuous sequence of text or images displayed on a screen.
meanings.sent1: The website had a beautiful scrolling banner at the top.
meanings.sent2: As I scrolled down the page, the scrolling text caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The scrolling credits at the end of the movie were surprisingly entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The scrolling marquee on the digital billboard was impossible to miss.
meanings.sent5: The museum's interactive exhibit had a mesmerizing scrolling display of historical events.
